name: Swedish Pancakes
author: Emma
summary: My family always has pancakes for breakfast on holidays. It wouldn't be Easter without Easter pancakes. Serve with preserves or applesauce.
directions: In a medium-size mixing bowl, beat yolks until thick
In a separate bowl, sift together flour, salt and sugar
Add the sugar mixture and milk into the egg yolks incrementally
Stir in the sour cream, In a medium-size mixing bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry
Fold the egg whiles into the batter
Heat skillet or griddle to a high temperature
Place a small amount of oil on the skillet and pour about 1 tablespoon of batter onto the skillet, and spread the batter out evenly
Brown the pancake on one side
Flip pancake over when bubbles appear on surface
